article_title: In the Meantime, Sen. Hester … (Gwen Moritz Editor's Note)
article_text: The private option provides a long-overdue lifeline to working people who have not managed to break into the middle class. Now our state is on the cusp of taking a giant step backward, taking away the private insurance that just began to provide a modicum of security for people living on the edge.

article_summary:
The private option provides a long-overdue lifeline to working people who have not managed to break into the middle class.
Now our state is on the cusp of taking a giant step backward, taking away the private insurance that just began to provide a modicum of security for people living on the edge.
